reviewText: good guide for learning sign language definalty need the video to go with it - just having the book can get confusing,  the video makes the difference
I bought this book, the copy I got came with either a VHS or DVD.  Lots of good video and a good book to go with it. I recommend it for learning ASL. I bought volume 2 and 3 as well.
This is the standard for introduction to ASL.  You get this book down, you will have a good foundation for further study and practice.
